programme.title: Coroner
programme.desc:

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Trailblazers Tandem Cycling Club offers recreational cycling to people who are blind or partially sighted through rides with sighted volunteers.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP04) In the episode of Dish with Mary, Mary visits Executive Chef Dan Bain at Lure Restaurant & Bar in Victoria, B.C. Chef Bain emphasizes the importance of using local ingredients and cooks an amazing West Coast menu.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) Coal Valley's widows, facing eviction from their homes, strike a deal with mine boss Henry Gowen, which leads them into the mines. Lead by Abigail and Cat, the women work to win the rights to their homes.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Across The Line
programme.desc:
Across The Line follows the Canadian Wheelchair Rugby team as they compete to qualify for the 2020 Tokyo Paralympic Games.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Kiesha's Story
programme.desc:

Année : 2014
